Topic.Title: How to handle strings in an MP game.

Posts.EditableText: ok, if i make a normal string, say... #class# and the player chooses a class, and then that class, ranger for example is entered into the #class# variable, that means that it will change the #class# variable for everybody? So, how do i make it so it only changes that string for that specific player? do i need like... #class[userid]# or something? also, i forgot how to display the PlayerNAME in the game, i know how to display the player ID, just not the name of the player lol

Got it it one. #class[userid]# is the way to go.

And (if you check the documentation...) $name(user id or player object name)$ returns the player name.
